data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Nagchu, Xizang, China.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Nagchu, Xizang, China
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Nagchu. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.section_summary: On average, 6 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Nagchu, Xizang, China.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Nagchu, Xizang, China to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 92,400 citizens of Nagchu, Xizang, China, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Adi Ramo people might believe through him.
Spirit, train the church of Nagchu, Xizang, China to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 7,010 believers in the county of Nagchu to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Nagchu, Xizang, China today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

location.name: Nagchu
location.people_groups_list: Tibetan, Khampa, Western, Khampa, Northern, Thami, Tibetan Gtsang
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Tibetan (949,000), Khampa, Western (270,000), Khampa, Northern (152,000), Thami (600), Tibetan Gtsang (766,000)
